text: Devons Road is a Docklands Light Railway (DLR) station located in between Bromley-by-Bow and Bow Common. The station takes its name from the B140 Devons Road and is between Langdon Park and Bow Church stations and is in Travelcard Zone 2. It is on the Stratford to Poplar branch of the DLR with services continuing on to Canary Wharf and Lewisham. ==Connections== London Buses routes 108 and 323 serve the station. ==References== == External links == * Docklands Light Railway website - Devons Road station page Category:Docklands Light Railway stations in the London Borough of Tower Hamlets Category:Railway stations in Great Britain opened in 1987 Category:Bromley-by-Bow Category:Bow Common
title: Devons Road DLR station
